name: The Tale of the Devilish Shrine Maiden
name_original: The Tale of the Devilish Shrine Maiden
description:
Ignore the stock Ren'Py assets and join Reimu on her quest to find (and pillage) the mythical Dragon Palace.

A game for the 5th Touhou Fan Game Jam. Play the others! Go on, do it!

Credits:

Engine: Ren'Py (https://www.renpy.org/) It's great!
